docs.snippet: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting great stories from around the web. Today, great reads from Sheri Fink, Jenna Wortham and others.
docs.abstract: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting great stories from around the web. Today, great reads from Sheri Fink, Jenna Wortham and others.

docs.snippet: Technology is now so pervasive in business that it might be time to call G.E. and Johnson & Johnson tech stocks, not just the Silicon Valley stars.

headline.print_headline: When Every Company Is a Tech Company
headline.main: When Every Company Is a Tech Company, Does the Label Matter?

docs.abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column examines implications of fact that four most valuable companies in Standard & Poor's 500-stock index at close of trading on August 1 were Apple, Google, Microsoft and Amazon, all of which are tech companies; notes that tech as concept may not be useful for understanding market, as almost every company is tech company in one sense or another.

docs.snippet: Apple, Facebook, Amazon and Alphabet will post quarterly earnings this week, reflecting how they are doing in online ads, mobile and cloud computing.
A weekly climate podcast in which a curious paleoecologist, worried meteorologist and gray-bearded environmental journalist discuss the end of the world as we knew it.

headline.main: A Podcast on Climate Science, Communication, Pokémon, the Presidency…

docs.abstract: A weekly climate podcast in which a curious paleoecologist, worried meteorologist and gray-bearded environmental journalist discuss the end of the world as we knew it.

docs.snippet: Some discussion of an app that can post criticism of one’s work and of Facebook’s new live video push and how users are pushing back.

headline.main: Mike and John on Annotation Terror and Annoying Video Alerts

docs.snippet: The lead poisoning in Flint, Mich., is a tragedy. But it’s just the tip of the iceberg.
Facebook pages, video challenges, mobile apps and other tools engage the bonds forged on the battlefield as a platform for prevention.

headline.print_headline: ‘Buddy Check on 22!’ Veterans Use Social Media to Combat Suicide
headline.main: ‘Buddy Check on 22!’ Veterans Use Social Media to Fight Suicide

docs.abstract: Online initiatives offer support and guidance to war veterans and active-duty soldiers from Iraq and Afghanistan coping with suicidal thoughts, PTSD and depression; social media offers veterans way of staying in contact with military friends and community as they contend with high suicide risk.

docs.snippet: In an online environment where Facebook readers comment before reading, is it possible to make veracity cool?

headline.main: Comment on That Shared Science Story – and Maybe Read it, Too!

docs.abstract: In an online environment where Facebook readers comment before reading, is it possible to make veracity cool?

docs.snippet: News from Zenefits, Apple, Spotify, Facebook and Tesla, which announced the death of a Tesla driver who crashed while using Autopilot.

headline.main: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: Death, Denial and Self-Driving Cars

docs.snippet: A grateful recipient of a new heart has inspired a drive to vastly enlarge the pool of prospective organ donors.

headline.main: Using Tweets and Posts to Speed Up Organ Donation
